Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO RACING AND WAGERING
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO RACING AND WAGERING
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Relates to eligibility requirements for horses participating in the three racing levels of the New York Sire Stakes program
Summary: Expands eligibility requirements for horses participating in the three racing levels of the New York Sire Stakes program.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to eligibility requirements for horses participating in the three racing levels of the New York Sire Stakes program
